Today in Moray, Spey Bay and Lossiemouth are offering small but clean surf at 1ft @8s with a moderate 13 mph SE wind. Best windows are from 09:35 to 16:29, so catch those peaks while you can! Tomorrow, conditions drop slightly to 2ft @5s with fresh 23 mph SE winds, making it less than ideal. The day after continues the trend with 3ft @5s, but the wind picks up to 27 mph SE, keeping it blown out. Best: today.
